overview: It’s a question that has dominated philosophical debate for eons: Who’s better? Chavs or footballers? Okay, so maybe the greatest minds aren’t exactly wracked over the issue, but one thing’s for sure – this collection of horny sports boys and their tearaway counterparts will quickly help you overcome any post-Olympic blues. Well-hung and all as horny as fuck, these lads just can’t wait to tear into each other for a cock-crazed, spunk-fuelled festival of hot fornication!
title: Chavs vs. Footballers
